metadata.description: Provide a prefix (max 10 characters, unique at tenant-scope) for the Management Group hierarchy and other resources created as part of Enterprise-scale.
Select whether the virtual network hub should be deployed or not.
Select whether the Azure Firewall should be deployed or not.
Select whether the Azure Firewall should be used as DNS Proxy or not.
Select whether the VPN Gateway should be deployed or not.
Select whether the ExpressRoute Gateway should be deployed or not.
Select whether the DDoS Standard protection plan should be enabled or not.
Provide the subscription id for the dedicated connectivity subscription.

properties.description: [concat('Virtual Network Manager to manage and deploy virtual networks for ', parameters('topLevelManagementGroupPrefix'))]

properties.subnets:
[
                                                    union(
                                                        if(
                                                            not(empty(parameters('subnetMaskForGw'))), variables('gwSubnet'), json('[]')
                                                        ), 
                                                        if(
                                                            not(empty(parameters('subnetMaskForAzFw'))), variables('fwSubnet'), json('[]')
                                                        ), 
                                                        if(
                                                            not(empty(parameters('subnetMaskForDnsResolverInbound'))), variables('dnsResolverInboundSubnet'), json('[]')
                                                        ), 
                                                        if(
                                                            not(empty(parameters('subnetMaskForDnsResolverOutbound'))), variables('dnsResolverOutboundSubnet'), json('[]')
                                                        )
                                                    )
                                                ]

sku.name:
[if(
                                                                 and(
                                                                     or(
                                                                         empty(parameters('gwRegionalSku')), 
                                                                         empty(parameters('gwAzSku'))), 
                                                                         not(
                                                                             empty(parameters('gwRegionalSku')))), 
                                                                                parameters('gwRegionalSku'), 
                                                                                parameters('gwAzSku'))]

[if(
                                                                 and(
                                                                     or(
                                                                         empty(parameters('erRegionalSku')), 
                                                                         empty(parameters('erAzSku'))), 
                                                                         not(
                                                                             empty(parameters('erRegionalSku')))), 
                                                                                parameters('erRegionalSku'), 
                                                                                parameters('erAzSku'))]
